description: ScoutAM dashboard modeled after the Library of Congress VSM visualizations.

panels.description: Show the total number of files archiving and staging.
panels.title: Scheduler Overview

targets.expr: sum by (domain) (scoutam_catalog_error{pool != "default", domain !~ "(s3|posix)", instance=~"$leader.*"} + scoutam_catalog_needsattention{pool != "default", instance=~"$leader.*"})

panels.description: Top 10 consumers of online data capacity.
panels.title: Top 10 Online Projects by Size

panels.description: Top 10 consumers of online data by file count.
panels.title: Top 10 Online Projects by File Count

panels.description: Top 10 consumers of archive data capacity.

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (name) (sum_over_time(scoutam_acct{type="project", category="total", metric="size"}[$__interval])) - sum by (name) (sum_over_time(scoutam_acct{type="project", category="online", metric="size"}[$__interval])))

panels.title: Top 10 Archive Projects by Size

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (name) (sum_over_time(scoutam_acct{type="project", category="total", metric="files"}[$__interval])) - sum by (name) (sum_over_time(scoutam_acct{type="project", category="online", metric="files"}[$__interval])))

panels.description: Percentage of CPU usage over 10 minute time frame
panels.title: CPU Usage

list.description: List of disk devices for which to show metrics.
list.label: Disk Devices
list.name: mdraid_pattern

title: ScoutAM
